getTrialParam

public abstract double getTrialParam()
Description copied from interface: Convergence
Get the current trial's parameter.

The parameter is the current value of the thing we're trying to measure the JND/Steven's Law/Contrast of.

Specified by:

parameter for the current trial

public abstract double getTrialCompare()
Description copied from interface: Convergence
Get the current trial's comparison value.

For the most part, this will often be the parameter that tracks the incorrect answer for each trial.
